com.here.android.mpa.ftcr

Class FTCRRouteOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.ftcr.FTCRRouteOptions

  • public class FTCRRouteOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the definition of the FTCRRouteOptions class.

    IMPORTANT: FTCRRouteOptions is a Beta feature. The related classes are subject to change without notice.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FTCRRouteOptions.FunctionalClass
      Represents functional classes.
      static class  FTCRRouteOptions.PrivateStreetUsageMode
      Represents usage mode of private streets for routing.
      static class  FTCRRouteOptions.RouteAvoidance
      Represents different options of routing avoidance.
      static class  FTCRRouteOptions.TimeType
      Ways that the time can be specified.
      static class  FTCRRouteOptions.TransportMode
      Represents values describing different mode of transportation a person will be usage.
      static class  FTCRRouteOptions.TurnAvoidance
      Represents turn avoidance options.
      static class  FTCRRouteOptions.Type
      Represents different types of routing, such as by speed or by distance.
      static class  FTCRRouteOptions.WaypointRestrictions
      Represents waypoint vehicle restrictions options.

      • setSpeed

        @NonNull
public FTCRRouteOptions setSpeed(FTCRRouteOptions.FunctionalClass functionalClass,
                                          int speedCategory,
                                          int speed)
        Sets speed for road functional class and speed category.
        Parameters:
        functionalClass - The desired FTCRRouteOptions.FunctionalClass.
        speedCategory - The desired speed category in range from 1 to 8.
        speed - The desired speed in kilometers per hour. If set to 0, the default speed will be used.
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.
